arts.ttl: A Disappointing Collapse Snaps Inter Miami's Undefeated Streak: 3 Takeaways From Loss vs. FC Dallas
arts.sum: Inter Miami CF are no longer undefeated in MLS after a late collapse against FC Dallas.

arts.ttl: Inter Miami, without Messi, loses 1st MLS game of season as FC Dallas rallies for a 4-3 victory
arts.sum: Inter Miami lost its first MLS game of the season Sunday with Lionel Messi watching from a private box as FC Dallas scored three unanswered goals in the second half for a 4-3 victory. Julio scored the equalizer when he retrieved a long ball from Pedrinho, dribbled unmarked inside the large area and beat Callender with an 18-yard conversion.

arts.ttl: Inter Miami 3–4 FC Dallas: Player Ratings As Herons Lose First Match of MLS season
arts.sum: Inter Miami CF lost their first game of the MLS season after collapsing from an early 2–0 lead against FC Dallas

arts.ttl: Inter Miami CF Predicted Lineup vs. FC Dallas: MLS
arts.sum: Lionel Messi has not scored in three straight games for Inter Miami CF

arts.ttl: Inter Miami vs. FC Dallas: Preview, Predictions, Team News
arts.sum: After losing Leg 1 of their Concacaf Champions Cup Semifinal to Vancouver Whitecaps FC, Inter Miami look to bounce back in MLS play against FC Dallas
